name: Vegetables Deluxe
overview: Description: A Match 3 game for the Commodore 64! Vegetables Deluxe is an upgraded version of the popular Commodore 64 match 3 game featuring all-new full colour hi-resolution graphics. The soundtrack now includes a choice of in-game music or sound effects, and the game code has been optimized to make it faster and more responsive. Players can choose one of four game modes: casual, classic, shopping and – for the ultimate challenge – Countdown. You’ll find yourself playing game after game as you try to beat your high score! Featuring: Hi-resolution Graphics 4 game modes PAL / NTSC compatible!
